Name: Bone Dust
About the game: Welcome to Bone Dust, skill-based arena shooter/bullet hell experience set in a nightmare circus! In this fast-paced FPS, you'll take on the role of a magician who uses her playing cards as a weapon to battle against waves of horrendous enemies in a closed arena environment. With arcade-style gameplay and epic boss battles, Bone Dust will keep you coming back for more. Put your skills to the test and see if you have what it takes to emerge victorious in the nightmare circus. Key Features: Fast-paced, arcade-style gameplay Fight your way to the global leaderboard Unique nightmare circus theme Play as a magician and use your playing cards as a weapon Epic boss battles in a closed arena Are you ready to enter the nightmare circus and face your fears?
